name: Earth Defense Force 6: Additional Mission Pack 1 - Lost Days
storyline:
What happened to the player character prior to EDF6, a soldier who traveled through time and tried to save humanity over and over again?
A prequel to the game for select elite EDF members, with over 15 additional missions of varying difficulty. An astonishing enemy that no one has ever seen awaits you in a hopeless battle. This is your fate...
summary:
EDF6 Additional Mission Pack 1.
Over 70 new weapons can be acquired by those who aspire to overcome a true challenge. Includes 5 difficulty levels + online co-op play.
